function.arguments:
{"thought":"To implement get_filtered_matrix, I need to:
- Build a matrix of average intensities for each (persona, experiencer) pair, excluding specified IDs.
- Standardize the matrix (z-score: subtract mean, divide by std).
- Only use group-specific personas/experiencers (exclude 'a person').

For get_delta, I need to:
- Compute the mean of in-group cells and out-group cells in the matrix (using check_in_group).
- Return the difference (in-group mean - out-group mean).

Both functions depend on the group_option, and the matrix shape is len(group_list) x len(group_list) (excluding 'a person').

I will implement both functions accordingly, using the patterns from draw_heatmap and check_in_group."}
function.name: think
